LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.PrevNextProduct.Admin.Settings.Enabled.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enable the Nop Prev-Next plugin. This setting is store specific if you have multiple stores.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.PrevNextProduct.Admin.Settings.EnableProductLooping.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: When you are on the last(first) product in a category the Next(Previous) button will lead you to the first(last) product in the same category.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.PrevNextProduct.Admin.Settings.ProductTitleLength.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set the maximum number of characters to be displayed of the prev/next product name (in case you have too long product names).
